mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY(P_ID, P_MER, MB_ID, P_DATE, EXH_TITLE, BUYER, BUYER_EMAIL, BUYER_TEL, AMOUNT, EXH_NO) VALUES( #{p_id}, #{p_mer}, #{mb_id}, #{p_date}, #{exh_title}, #{buyer}, #{buyer_email}, #{buyer_tel}, #{amount}, #{exh_no})
mapper.select: SELECT e.EXH_TITLE, AMOUNT, BUYER, BUYER_TEL, P_DATE, P_ID, P_MER, P_CHK FROM PAY P, MEMBER MB , exhibition e WHERE 1=1 AND P.MB_ID=MB.MB_ID AND P.MB_ID = #{mb_id} AND p.EXH_TITLE = e.EXH_TITLE ORDER BY P_DATE DESC
